welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kishangarh, where the rich history and majestic forts await your exploration. Enjoy the city's vibrant culture, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine as you immerse yourself in all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Unique Brew
restaurants.description: Unique Brew is a café located in Kishangarh.
restaurants.address: Near Shardul School (Main Road), Kishangarh 305801, Rājasthān

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Amrit Restaurant
restaurants.description: Amrit Restaurant is a indian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Panghat Hotel And Resturant
restaurants.description: Panghat Hotel And Resturant is a indian restaurant located in Kishangarh.
restaurants.address: NH 8, Jaipur Road, Prem Nagar, Kishangarh, Rajishthan

restaurants.name: Hotel Mayur Palace
restaurants.description: Hotel Mayur Palace is a bakery located in Jatli.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kishangarh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
